梒字的基本解释

梒
hán
樱桃。

梒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hán］
［《廣韻》胡男切，平覃，匣。］
(1)果木名。即樱桃。
(2)木桃。

梒字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梒； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页528第24
【唐韻】胡男切【集韻】【類篇】胡南切，?音含。梒桃，果名。櫻桃也。亦作含。【禮·月令】仲夏之月，以含桃薦寢廟。

梒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
梒字的起名意思

樱桃。

Basic explanation of words
Shame
hán
Cherry.
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [hán]
["Guangyun" Hu Nanqie, Pingtan, Xia. ]
(1) The name of the fruit tree. Namely cherries.
(2) Wood peach.
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梒; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 528 24
[Tang Yun] Hu Nanqie [Jiyun] [Classes] Hu Nanqie,? Yin Han. Peach, fruit name. Cherries too. Also included. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】Midsummer month, with peaches recommended for the temple.
